DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study compare efficacy safety Tarceva plus Avastin , chemotherapy plus Avastin , first-line treatment patient advance non-small cell lung cancer . Patients randomize receive either Tarceva 150mg p.o . daily plus Avastin 15mg/kg i.v . every 3 week , standard platinum-based chemotherapy ( 4-6 cycle ) plus Avastin . The anticipated time study treatment disease progression , target sample size 100-500 individual .
